title: DPM Dar outlines govt efforts for transparent privatisation of SOEs
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 10 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Tuesday chaired a high-level meeting to discuss the ongoing process of outsourcing the airports and the privatisation of state-owned enterprises (SOEs).
The deputy prime minister outlined the government’s efforts to strengthen Pakistan’s economy and transparent privatisation of SOEs, according to the foreign ministry’s press release.
Minister for Privatisation and Investment Abdul Aleem Khan, National Coordinator SIFC and officials from relevant ministries attended the meeting.
